headline: Nevada reports May statewide gaming win down 2.18% to $1.29B
summary: Nevada reports May Las Vegas Strip gaming win down 3.87% versus last year to $713.77M. Publicly traded companies in the gaming space include Boyd Gaming (BYD), Caesars (CZR), Churchill Downs (CHDN), DraftKings (DKNG), Flutter Entertainment (FLUT), Gan Limited (GAN), Genius Sports (GENI), Las Vegas Sands (LVS), MGM Resorts (MGM), Penn Entertainment (PENN), Rush Street Interactive (RSI), Sportradar (SRAD) and Wynn Resorts (WYNN). Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, marke
